meanings.definition: Being the same in all respects; identical.
meanings.sent1: The twins wore identic outfits to the party.
meanings.sent2: The two snowflakes were identic in shape and size.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a sight to see two identic cars parked next to each other.
meanings.sent4: Their identic voices made it hard to tell them apart over the phone.
meanings.sent5: The identic patterns on the wallpaper created a mesmerizing effect in the room.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is identical with another.
meanings.sent1: She found her identic in the mirror reflection.
meanings.sent2: The scientist was searching for an identic match in the DNA samples.
meanings.sent3: The identic of the missing key turned out to be a spare hidden in the drawer.
meanings.sent4: In the world of art, finding an identic of a masterpiece is a rare discovery.
meanings.sent5: The identic of the lost cat was found safe and sound in the neighbor's yard.
